profile:
The Eavestrough Company has been in business for 16 years and we have more than 60 years of combined experience in the field. This has earned us a superior reputation for quality and professionalism.

We are members of the Better Business Bureau and we have won Best Eavestrough and Siding Company in the Burlington/Oakville area in 2013, 2014, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, and 2022. These awards were based on our phenomenal reviews about our outstanding workmanship and client experiences by homeowners who hired us to work on their homes.

The Eavestrough Company serves Burlington, Oakville, Mississauga, Niagara, Cambridge, and Hamilton area installing eavestrough, fascia, soffit, siding and leaf guard systems. Our experience and expertise has earned us one of the best reputations in the Golden Horseshoe area. If you want a job that is done to perfection and at a fair price, give The Eavestrough Company a call today at (905) 966-2564 or visit our website at www.theeavestroughcompany.com

https://www.facebook.com/theeavestroughcompany/
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1cDkBnuLFYhmVRcL5gKzqg

profile: Siding, Stucco, Stone, Brick, Masonry and Fireplaces From design to installation, Stone Selex Design is a premier company with over 20 years of experience providing both residential and commercial customers with quality installation and a high level of customer satisfaction. Stone Selex Design is committed to providing full service installation for your exterior or interior stone veneer project. We also provide installation of stone veneer, stucco, brick, masonry and fireplace transformations. Design your own project with the NEW Stone Veneer Visualizer and have Stone Selex Design install it for you. The Visualizer gives you the ability to envision your project from the comfort of your computer screen. It has the power to transform a photo of your home into a professional digital rendering by adding siding, stucco and stone. Make your home the talk of the neighbourhood with stone and stucco, or stone and brick, or siding and brick, stone tile and wood siding. The possibilities of style and colour combinations are endless. A Stone Selex Design project manager will help you with each stage of your project from where to add stone, stucco, siding, brick and masonry and provide you with a quote for our installation services provided by our experienced masonry installers. If it’s a fireplace that you want to create or just simply add stone or masonry, Stone Selex Design and the visualizer can help you with this too. While you are in the planning stages of your fireplaces transformation the visualizer is a great tool to use. Look through photos for ideas and see what others are doing and then come to Stone Selex Design and ask us to install it for you. Visit us here: https://twitter.com/StoneSelex https://www.facebook.com/StoneSelexInc/

profile:
Welcome!

Baz Aluminum has a proven record of excellence in designing and managing several building and construction projects in the GTA. No matter the size of your project, the experienced professionals at Baz Aluminum will plan, design, construct, and maintain your project.
You'll Be Glad You Chose Us
Effective planning is crucial to the successful completion of any project. Before starting the project, our team of experts will first assess your goals. Then we provide you with an estimate and time-line for completion. From beginning to end you will be involved every step of the way.
Cost-Effective Services
Eliminate all the items on your to-do list by calling the experts at Baz Aluminum. You'll be glad you did. We have many years of experience and work hard to make sure the job is done right while saving you time, money, and aggravation. We'll be there whenever you need us.
Call us today to get your project underway

profile:
Topflight Aluminum is dedicated to providing quality construction and exceptional customer service. We strive to build lifelong relationships with our customers and to exceed your expectations, in every aspect of the job, from start to finish.
We’ve helped thousands of people improve the look and quality of their homes and businesses. We are proud to serve Toronto (GTA), Etobicoke, North York, Scarborough, Vaughan, Richmond Hill, Markham, Stouffville, King City, Aurora, York Region, Mississauga, Oakville, Hamilton residents with expert craftsmanship and professionalism. We pride ourselves on being able to exceed the expectations of our customers.

•	WHY TopFlight Aluminum?

1.	Quality first, Speed second
We all like our issues to be resolved efficiently when contacting a company, but what will make you use Topflight Aluminum again and again? There is only one answer. The quality of the service!

2.	Great Customer Service
We understand that building or remodeling a home is a major investment, so for us it is important that our customers feel valued. Topflight Aluminum pays special attention to what our clients want, we remember the details no matter how insignificant and deliver quality services at all times.

3.	Top Quality Materials
Apart from good workmanship and top-grade professionals handling your building project, the best quality of materials we use will be next most important factor in determining the outcome of your building.

4.	Warranty

Building your dream house shouldn’t be a nightmare! That’s why we only use guaranteed products and materials with 30- to 50-year warranties. Additionally, all of our work comes with workmanship warranty. Whether you are replacing or repairing, Topflight Aluminum can always meet your needs!

OUR MISSION
Our goal is simple… To perform for our customers the highest level of quality construction services at fair and market competitive prices. We aim to maintain the highest levels of professionalism, integrity, honesty and fairness in our relationships with our suppliers, subcontractors, professional associates and customers.





GET A FREE QUOTE
No unexpected charges —see exactly what your home needs with a free estimate.

profile:
Dear Customer,
Fix Aluminum Inc. is operating in GTA (Greater Toronto Area). Toronto, North York, Etobicoke, East York, Scarborough, Pickering, Ajax, Markham, Richmond Hill, Vaughan, Newmarket, Whitchurch-Stouffville, Mississauga, Oakville, Milton, Brampton, Caledon, Halton Hills since 1992.

We offer a variety of aluminum work such as: 

1.	Eavestrough  (5” &  6” – Half Round – Copper)
2.	Downpipes (2x2 – 3x3 – 3x4) with Elbows.
3.	Leaf Guards (Alu-rex and all other products)
4.	Soffit (Deluxe Vented Panels & Solid Plain Panels)
5.	Fascia (6” -  8” and all other custom sizes)
6.	Siding (Vinyl & Aluminum)
7.	Copper
8.	Capping or Cladding
9.	Flashing or Drip Edge
10.	Doors & Windows (Frame Capping)

We offer Free Estimates.	
We offer the most competitive and best price that matches our craftsmanship.
We do not subcontract our work therefore our own installation crews will do the work for you.
Our installation crews are highly trained professionals with many years of experience.
We use the best materials in market. Our suppliers are Gentek and Kaycan.

10 years warranty on labor.
25 years warranty on materials.
WSIB Insured, Bonded and Licensed.

We're social here: https://www.facebook.com/fixaluminum

profile:
We Provide Professional Home Exterior Services

Serving Toronto and GTA, Kresic Aluminum is one of Ontario's best home exterior service providers. For over 5 years and 5,000 projects our friendly technicians have been getting the job done right - and it's always guaranteed! We proudly offer a 5-year guarantee on installations and 2-year guarantee on repairs. You can trust us to care for your property like it is our own!
products:
For gutter seals we use best on market Kop-R-Lastic® Sealant wich is a one-part, highly elastic, high-performance thermoplastic sealant. The sealant exhibits excellent adhesion to a variety of construction materials. It can be applied to wet or dry surfaces and has excellent low temperature flexibility
For every aluminum installation we use matching colored screws
We also use multiple aluminum and siding supliers such as KAYCAN Ltd., GENTEK, etc.
services: We service residential homes, condos, housing complexes, and commercial buildings in and around GTA
specialities:
Eavestrough/Gutter/Downspouts installation and repairs
Siding/Soffit/Fascia installation and repairs

profile:
While located in Mississauga, Ontario Golden Horse Shu Living Inc. offers our renovation services all over the GTA even covering the Niagara region. We are a family run business, strongly committed to providing a high quality of craftsmanship and customer service to each and every customer, no matter the size of the job. Over eighty percent of our business is from repeat and referral customers. This success stems, in part, from the reputation GHSL Inc. has built over the past 3 years in business.
 
While other companies may send their representatives to your home, the owners of Golden Horse Shu Living Inc. personally estimates each job and works side-by-side with you on every aspect of your project from start to finish. We are a start to finish company we will get your work done in a timely manner and minimize any down time that may occur during your project.
 
Golden Horse Shu Living Inc. licensed and for your protection we carry both liability and WSIB for all of our workers and employees. Our Company stand behind all work performed and backs all projects with a full 1 year warranty.
 
GHSL Inc. offers comprehensive remodeling services and is dedicated to ensuring complete satisfaction on each and every job. Whether you want to remodel the kitchen or redo the bathroom, our team of professional craftsmen can transform your wish list into the reality of a beautifully remodeled home.

profile:
Gateway Roofing & Contracting Ltd is dedicated to providing the best service and they do everything they can to make sure you are completely satisfied with the work provided. Using the latest industry-approved practices to reinforce vulnerable and weak areas so your home is protected long after the work is done. 
 
Asphalt shingles may be their specialty but they are also experienced in eavestrough, soffit, fascia, siding, attic insulation & venting, skylights and much more. A harsh climate, bad architectural design, inadequate roof ventilation and lack of insulation can disrupt the function of your home causing roofing and waterproofing products to break down prematurely. They will identify these issues, educate you with a proper solution and provide a written estimate.

profile:
We are a renovation and construction company focused of on the important details of any job.  Whether we are laying one room of hardwood or building you a brand new house attention to how it is done and built so that it lasts is what we do.

Our team of experienced professionals are experts in what they do and know how to effectively apply their skills, workmanship and customer service excellence to assist you with your needs. Our knowledgeable staff is dependable, reliability and excel at offering personal service to all our customers.

Experts in Roofing, Siding, Gutters and Eavestroughs as well as Whole Home Renovations, Decks, Fences and Gates. Have a commercial property needing attending to? We are here for you as well!

Our company mission is to provide quality products and services at competitive rates. We are industry professionals and we are committed to listening to our customers to address your needs. We do it right the first time – we guarantee it.

We contribute our continued growth over the years to the quality of our workmanship, our selection of services and affordable rates. We take pride in the solid customer relationships we have built; our longevity in the industry is testament to our commitment to our customers.

Look forward to hearing from you!
specialities: All types of siding, roofing gutters as well as eavestroughs for both residential and commercial properties. Full interior renovations are also a specialty of ours that we take pride in treating each client as special and attending to their individual needs and desires. Decks, Fences or Gates? Yes, we are pros!
